page.title: 13EVENTS KING'S NYMPTON
page.content: SOCIAL EVENTS {CHURCH REVEL-}originally held in July to celebrate the Patron Saint's Day (St.James)this is now held on the Summer Bank Holiday Saturday in the Old Rectory Garden. Stalls of cakes and fancy goods,competitions and home made teas make this an enjoyable afternoon. {KING'S NYMPTON CAPERS }An annual July event held in the Playing Field and organised by the Playing Field Committee.Every village group is represented on the committee and mans a stall on that occasion.The Primary School gives a display of Maypole Dancing.The King's Nympton Handbell Ringers provide music. The afternoon concludes with races for the children and energetic adults.
